p: Antioxidants have been defined by FDA as “substances used to preserve food by retarding deterioration, rancidity, or discoloration due to oxidation” [ 144]. Autoxidation comprises of a free radical chain mechanism in which unsaturated fatty acids react with free radicals [ 145]. Apart from autoxidation, lipid quality deterioration can arise from photooxidative conditions, oxidation via lipoxygenase-assisted process or oxidation under high temperatures [ 145].
